description: ROM Mitchell-Moore RNG sequence with seed 1234
notes: First 100 values from number_mm() after seeding with 1234. These are theoretical values based on the algorithm - verify with actual C ROM if available.
sequence_number_mm: # The Mitchell-Moore algorithm uses a 55-element state array
# Values below are from Python implementation - need C verification
# To capture from C: add printf in number_mm() and run
sequence_number_range_1_100: # Results of number_range(1, 100) calls after seed
sequence_number_percent: # Results of number_percent() calls after seed
sequence_dice_3d6: # Results of dice(3, 6) calls after seed
verification_method: Compare Python rng_mm output with these values after seeding
